title: 18 perches land with House in Dehiwala
details:
DEHIWALA BELLANTHARA

18 perch land in residential area. And Old House with 5 Rooms, 3 Toilets, 3 car Ports and Garage. Kitchen, Pantry. 20 feet road.

100M For 117 Bus Root. 5Min. For Dehiwala Junction and Papiliyana Junction.

Total Value 45M ( Price can be negotiable)
